articles.author: Rob Gillies
articles.title: Carney says Canada has no plans to pursue free trade agreement with China as Trump threatens tariffs - AP News
articles.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney says his country has no intention of pursuing a free trade deal with China. He was responding to U.S. President Donald Trump’s threat to impose a 100% tariff on goods imported from Canada if America’s northern neighbor went…
articles.content: TORONTO (AP) Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said Sunday his country has no intention of pursuing a free trade deal with China. He was responding to U.S. President Donald Trumps threat to impose … [+3901 chars]

articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin wins last slalom before Olympics and locks up record ninth season discipline title - AP News
articles.description: Mikaela Shiffrin has locked up the World Cup slalom title with two races to spare and became the first skier with nine season titles in one discipline. The American star dominated the last slalom before the Olympics as she won both runs to beat runner-up Cami…
articles.content: SPINDLERUV MLYN, Czech Republic (AP) Mikaela Shiffrin has locked up the slalom season title with the Olympics looming to become the first skier in the six-decade history of the World Cup with nine se… [+3187 chars]

articles.author: Matt O'Brien, Linley Sanders
articles.title: How Americans are using AI at work, according to a new Gallup poll - AP News
articles.description: A new Gallup poll finds that American workers have adopted artificial intelligence into their work lives at a remarkable pace over the past few years. Some 12% of employed adults say they use AI daily in their job, while nearly half say they've used it at lea…
